tests.query:
--
-- PGP Public Key Encryption
--

-- As most of the low-level stuff is tested in symmetric key
-- tests, here's only public-key specific tests

create table keytbl (
	id int4,
	name text,
	pubkey text,
	seckey text
)
tests.name: pgp-pubkey-decrypt.sql

tests.query:
create table encdata (
	id int4,
	data text
)
tests.name: pgp-pubkey-decrypt.sql
